name: nextjs-generic-landing-page
description: A generic landing page template, built in Next.js (React) with static HTML export

scripts.vercel: echo 'Running as Vercel serverless'; vercel dev --listen 3010
scripts.x-prepublish: rm -rf dist && for folder in {components,lib,config,public}; do mkdir -p dist/${folder} && babel ${folder} -d dist/${folder} --copy-files --presets=@babel/preset-env,next --plugins=styled-jsx/babel; done && cp package.json dist/
